about_the_game:
Ascend to Global Supremacy with War to the Core!

Dive into the exhilarating chaos of global conflict as you command colossal motherships in War to the Core, the pulse-pounding MOBA sensation on Steam! Seize control of the cosmos as you vie for planetary domination, all the while battling to secure the dwindling resources needed to fuel your war machine.

Unleash your strategic genius with an awe-inspiring arsenal of futuristic weaponry and equipment. Rain fiery destruction upon your enemies with long-range missiles, lay treacherous orbital minefields to thwart their advances, erect fearsome turrets to decimate their forces, or rush aid to your beleaguered allies in the nick of time.

Forge your path to victory by tailoring your mothership to match your battle-hardened tactics. Will you opt for the surgical precision of long-range stingers to annihilate your adversaries from afar? Or do you prefer to swoop in, clad in impenetrable armor and shields, and crush your foes in a storm of close-quarters combat? The choice is yours!

The fate of the galaxy hangs in the balance. Are you ready to seize your destiny and reign supreme in War to the Core? Enlist today!

Forge your path to victory by tailoring your mothership to match your battle-hardened tactics. Will you opt for the surgical precision of long-range stingers to annihilate your adversaries from afar? Or do you prefer to swoop in, clad in impenetrable armor and shields, and crush your foes in a storm of close-quarters combat? The choice is yours!

name: War to the Core

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32 or 64-bit)
  • Processor: intel core i3 2.2 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8500 GT/ AMD HD Radeon HD 5550
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32 or 64-bit)
  • Processor: intel core i5 2.8 GHZ or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 / AMD Radeon HD 8870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: War to the Core is a tactical multiplayer Moba/RTS hybrid where you control a mothership and battle on a team against other teams for total world domination. Use all the available resources, from interceptors, you can control while alive or dead to different upgradable ship components to win!
